sentences.en: ...a man interviewed in one of our studies whom we shall designate as E.
sentences.cn: …一个我们在一项研究中采访过并会将其命名为E的男人。

sentences.en: A horizontal bar over a particle symbol is used to designate the antiparticle.
sentences.cn: 粒子符号上加一横,用来表示反粒子.

sentences.en: Allocate - How you designate number of credits to your site.
sentences.cn: 分配 – 你为你的网页分配积分的方式.

sentences.en: Buildings are designated by red squares on the map.
sentences.cn: 在地图上建筑物用红色方块标明。

sentences.en: Designate secure areas to store and protect your products.
sentences.cn: 指定安全的储存区,保护您的产品.

sentences.en: It is occasionally necessary to use a number system to designate the position of each ligand.
sentences.cn: 有时需要用一种编号系统来标明各配体的位置.

sentences.en: It's better to designate Tanggu as the loading port.
sentences.cn: 在塘沽装货比较合适.

sentences.en: KXK, GXK designate respectively limIt'switches in open and close direction.
sentences.cn: KXK 和GXK分别为行程开向 、 关向限位开关.

sentences.en: May shipment we designate President 5000 tons 1.5 % more or less.
sentences.cn: 五月装船,选定总统号装载5000号,多装或少装1.5%均可.

sentences.en: May shipped. We designate s . s . President, 5000 tons, 1.5 % more or less.
sentences.cn: 五月装船,选定总统号装载5000吨, 多装或少装1.5%均可.

sentences.en: Personally designate each player a non negotiable card that they cannot change.
sentences.cn: 亲自选定各个球员他们无法改变的一张非可协议的卡片.

sentences.en: Some of the rooms were designated as offices.
sentences.cn: 其中一些房间是被指定用作办公室的。

sentences.en: The - ase ending is used to designate enzymes.
sentences.cn: 词尾--ase表示酶.

sentences.en: the director designate
sentences.cn: 候任董事

sentences.en: The lake was recently designated a conservation area.
sentences.cn: 这个湖最近被指定为保护区。

sentences.en: There are efforts under way to designate the bridge a historic landmark.
sentences.cn: 人们正在努力将这座桥定为历史遗迹。

sentences.en: These crosses on the drawing designate all possible entrances to the castle.
sentences.cn: 图上的十字记号指出了城堡里所有可能的入口.

sentences.en: They designate Mr. Yang as director of the laboratory.
sentences.cn: 他们选派杨先生为实验室主任.

sentences.en: This floor has been designated a no-smoking area.
sentences.cn: 这楼层已定为无烟区。

sentences.en: Will you designate the flowers you wish?
sentences.cn: 你能说出你想要的花 吗 ?

sentences.en: Words in Bold designate keys in the keypad push at that time.
sentences.cn: 当按主任何键时.会显示粗体字提示.

words.tran_cn: 由设计师专门设计的；享有盛名的；赶时髦的

trans.tran_en: used after the name of an official job to show that someone has been chosen for that job but has not yet officially started work
to choose someone or something for a particular job or purpose

trans.tran_cn: 指派， 委任； 指定； 标出， 标明； 把…定名为， 称呼
trans.tran_en: to choose someone or something for a particular job or purpose
